list.abs: a disgusting smell ; distasteful language ; a loathsome disease ; the idea of eating meat is repellent to me ; revolting food ; a wicked stench .令人作呕的气味；冒犯性的语言；讨厌的疾病；吃肉的主意让我反感；令人作呕的食物；令人作呕的臭味。
this loathsome gargoyle who burns in hell ., 这恶心的怪物 , 在地狱里燃烧.
I should think it an extremely loathsome profession ., 我看那是个极其讨厌的职业.
Murder is a vile and loathsome crime ., 谋杀是邪恶而令人发指的罪行.

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being disgusting to the senses or emotions
